ygData.subject: Re: There Is No Escape
ygData.msgSnippet: Allrighty, it seems I made a small but rather huge mistake in my first post today. I meant STOP arguing, not START arguing. So STOP arguing, everyone! - A

Allrighty, it seems I made a small but rather huge mistake in my first post 
today. I meant STOP arguing, not START arguing. So STOP arguing, everyone!

- A not-so-perfect Zardus
